In the third H site, H(4) is bonded in a distorted T-shaped geometry to two equivalent Li(1) and one B(1) atom. In the fourth H site, H(8) is bonded in a single-bond geometry to two equivalent Li(1) and one B(2) atom. In the fifth H site, H(5) is bonded in a water-like geometry to one Li(1) and one B(1) atom. In the sixth H site, H(1) is bonded in a single-bond geometry to one N(1) atom. In the seventh H site, H(6) is bonded in a 3-coordinate geometry to two equivalent Li(1) and one B(1) atom.
